lines.text: Executive officer do you believe in God?
Well, I do. Take a look. At this close distance... they shouldn't be able to warp any closer. We'll beat them by 12 minutes.
That's what I'd call a miracle.
A miracle... That's a word God created for us, just for this moment.
The moon is great, you're weightless! On Earth, your bra's too tight, your shoulders are in knots, and soon your boobs sag.
